name: The Legend of Thule
description:
TO PLAY: download the HTML file attached below. Open the downloaded file; the file game will play from your browser window. 

Well done, Adventure Sleuth - you have journeyed far and beyond space and time to arrive here. Within these pages are answers to the riddles of the Legend of Thule, but have you reached the end? 

This portion of your journey takes approximately 30-45 minutes to complete, and contains audio components; please adjust your audio settings to low before beginning. If at any point you become disoriented in this portion of your quest, send word to the game developers through the usual channel. We will be in touch shortly with assistance!

Thank you, Gentle Voyager, for playing the Legend of Thule!
